data.feedback: Epic is well-designed with verified file paths, correct patterns from existing codebase, and comprehensive coverage of real-time client requirements. Minor issues (path typo, missing story dependency) are trivial and won't block implementation.
issues: Story 3: Should explicitly depend on Story 2 since it imports WebSocketEvent
suggestions: Fix pubspec.yaml path in Story 1 description
Add Story 2 as dependency for Story 3
